about_the_game:
Enter The Aftermath


Embark on a journey through the remnants of a shattered world in this gripping survival adventure.

Scavenge and Survive


As one of the few remaining survivors, search for resources amidst desolate landscapes and crumbling cities while avoiding hostile factions and the relentless undead.

Discover the Mysteries


Uncover the secrets of the apocalypse and form alliances with fellow survivors to rebuild civilization. Every decision carries weight in this unforgiving world where danger lurks around every corner.

Shape Humanity's Fate


Will you rise above the chaos and carve out a new future for humanity, or will you succumb to the despair of the wasteland? Your fate awaits in this captivating post-apocalyptic experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2310
  • Graphics: UHD Graphics for 11th Gen Intel
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Generation and above
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Traverse a post-apocalyptic world as the lone survivor. Navigate treacherous terrain, scavenge for essentials, and confront the horrors of the apocalypse. Will you rebuild civilization or succumb to the chaos of the wasteland?
